title: Creates the new crime of cyber harassment; and increases the penalties for the crimes of harassment and stalking when committed against a child
summary: Creates the new crime of cyber harassment; and increases the penalties for the crimes of harassment in 1st and 2nd degree and stalking in the 3rd and 4th degree when committed by an adult against a child.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to creating the new crime of cyber harassment; and increasing penalties for the crimes of harassment and stalking
